title: droomagon
author: droomagon
content: - this is strictly a windows 10 question, not HiveOS = = =i am not sure if anybody has tried this on windows, but i have some non-LHR cards in one of my rigsoooooo, if i buy a 3070ti, and mix it in with that rig, and start running NBminer 41.0 on it, would it play nice and run stable? or would i have to solo that 3070ti on another computer?

comments.author: S3300
comments.body: LHR graphic card or not they will both work well using Nbminer, even Trex latest update now supports LHR unlock and its more stable for me than Nbminer, I have a 3070ti connected fo motherboard with a gtx1660 and I get 25MH from the 1660 and 81MH from the 3070ti.
